Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at 87th
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains continue to stand at 87th due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at 87th due to police activity. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include: #21 Cermak, #29 State or the #62 Archer.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
